metadata.title: CVE-2021-37978 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Blink in Google Chrome prior to 94.0.4606.81allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
